title: Body of missing 10-year-old girl Skylea Carmack found in shed behind home; stepmother arrested for murder
text:
Body of missing 10-year-old girl Skylea Carmack found in shed behind home; stepmother arrested for murder

Body of missing 10-year-old girl Skylea Carmack found in shed behind home; stepmother arrested for murder originally appeared on abcnews.go.com

The search for a missing 10-year-old girl from Indiana came to a tragic end after her body was found in a shed behind her home and her stepmother was arrested for her murder, officials said.

Skylea Carmack was found hidden inside a plastic trash bag around 3 a.m. on Wednesday, according to Indiana State Police.

Her stepmother, Amanda Carmack, 34, has since been arrested and faces charges of murder, neglect of a dependent resulting in death, domestic battery resulting in death and strangulation, state police said.

PHOTO: Skylea Carmack in an undated photo. (Gas City Police Department) More

(MORE: Teen confesses to killing all 5 family members, including 3 young children, in Alabama home: Authorities)

Skylea had been missing since Saturday, according to police. She was first reported missing by Carmack.

Preliminary evidence showed that Skylea was killed between 4:30 p.m. and 6 p.m. on Saturday, police said.

(MORE: Ride-share driver who claimed family sold toddler for $10,000 romantically linked to father: Police)

Police believe she was strangled to death. An autopsy will be conducted to determine the official cause of death.

Police did not say what led to the killing.

"To try to rationalize why someone would kill a 10-year-old, there's no rationale for that," Tony Slocum, spokesman for the Indiana State Police, said at a press conference Wednesday. "That's just an act of cowardice."

PHOTO: Amanda Carmack in a police booking photo. (Grant County Jail) More

Slocum directed questions regarding any prior domestic incidents at the Carmack home to the state's Department of Child Services (DCS). A spokeswoman for DCS told ABC News the agency could not comment on whether they were, or were not, involved with a family because of confidentiality laws.

Six other children, with the oldest being 13 years old, were removed from the Carmack home over the weekend and are currently in the care of CPS, Slocum said.

Carmack is currently being held at Grant County Jail.

She did not have an attorney listed on Wednesday.
description: The search for a missing 10-year-old girl from Indiana came to a tragic end after her body was found in a shed behind her home and her stepmother was arrested for her murder, officials said.  Skylea Carmack was found hidden inside a plastic trash bag around 3 a.m. on Wednesday, according to Indiana State
